posts.title: Introduction to Vue.js
posts.body: Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It is designed to be incrementally adoptable, making it easy to integrate into existing projects or start new ones.
posts.author: John Doe

posts.title: Getting Started with Pinia
posts.body: Pinia is a store library for Vue, it allows you to share a state across components/pages.
posts.author: Jane Smith

posts.title: Mastering Vue Router
posts.body: Vue Router is the official router for Vue.js. It deeply integrates with Vue.js core to make building Single Page Applications with Vue.js a breeze. It provides advanced features such as lazy loading, dynamic route matching, and navigation guards.
posts.author: Alex Johnson
